birth_place.zh-cn: 大清浙江省宁波府镇海县
birth_place.en: Zhenhai County, Ningbo Prefecture, Zhejiang, Qing dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省台北市
death_place.en: Taipei, Taiwan Province, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，黄埔军校第一期毕业，是蒋介石最信任的将领之一。曾参与东征、北伐、抗日战争和国共内战，号称“西北王”。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army, a graduate of the first class of the Whampoa Military Academy, and one of Chiang Kai-shek's most trusted generals. He participated in the Eastern Expedition, Northern Expedition, Second Sino-Japanese War, and the Chinese Civil War, known as the 'King of the Northwest'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Chinese political and military leader who served as the leader of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南的妻子，教育家。
description.en: Wife of Hu Zongnan, an educator.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南长子，曾任中华民国国家安全会议秘书长。
description.en: Eldest son of Hu Zongnan, former Secretary-General of the National Security Council of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南次子，台湾中原大学副校长。
description.en: Second son of Hu Zongnan, vice president of Chung Yuan Christian University in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南长女，作家。
description.en: Eldest daughter of Hu Zongnan, a writer.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南次女。
description.en: Second daughter of Hu Zongnan.

nodes.id: 中华民国陆军军官学校

zh-cn: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 中华民国创建的第一所现代军事学校。
description.en: The first modern military academy established in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党革命家，曾任黄埔军校党代表。
description.en: A revolutionary of the Kuomintang, served as the Party Representative of the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国民间义士，斧头帮领袖。
description.en: A Chinese folk hero and leader of the Axe Gang during the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华复兴社的前身，由黄埔军校毕业生组成的秘密政治团体。
description.en: The predecessor of the Fuxing Society, a secret political group formed by graduates of the Whampoa Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 由黄埔军校毕业生组成的秘密政治团体，又称蓝衣社。
description.en: A secret political group formed by graduates of the Whampoa Military Academy, also known as the Blue Shirts Society.

description.zh-cn: 对复兴社十三名核心干部的称呼。
description.en: A term for the thirteen core cadres of the Fuxing Society.

description.zh-cn: 中共情报“后三杰”之一，曾任胡宗南的机要秘书。
description.en: One of the 'Later Three Heroes' of CCP intelligence, served as Hu Zongnan's confidential secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中共情报“后三杰”之一，潜伏于胡宗南身边。
description.en: One of the 'Later Three Heroes' of CCP intelligence, who infiltrated Hu Zongnan's inner circle.

description.zh-cn: 中共情报“后三杰”之一，潜伏于胡宗南身边。
description.en: One of the 'Later Three Heroes' of CCP intelligence, who infiltrated Hu Zongnan's inner circle.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，军事家。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, a military strategist.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高监察机关。
description.en: The highest supervisory body of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国监察委员，曾率众弹劾胡宗南。
description.en: A member of the Control Yuan of the Republic of China, who led the impeachment of Hu Zongnan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国将领，曾任国防部副参谋总长。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China, served as Deputy Chief of the General Staff of the Ministry of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事人物，国民政府军事委员会调查统计局负责人。
description.en: A military figure of the Republic of China, head of the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics of the National Military Council.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，连战之父。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, father of Lien Chan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，曾任参谋总长。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army, served as Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国将领，曾任海军陆战队司令。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China, served as Commander of the Marine Corps.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间的一场战役，胡宗南部队在此战中遭受重创。
description.en: A campaign during the Second Chinese Civil War where Hu Zongnan's forces suffered heavy losses.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国将领，在宜川战役中阵亡。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China who was killed in action during the Yichuan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国将领，在宜川战役中阵亡。
description.en: A general of the Republic of China who was killed in action during the Yichuan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的第二次内战。
description.en: The second civil war in China between the Kuomintang and the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国浙江省的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of Zhejiang Province, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军驻防于澎湖的军事部队。
description.en: A military unit of the Republic of China Army stationed in Penghu.

description.zh-cn: 国共内战后期国民政府在西南地区设立的军事指挥机构。
description.en: A military command established by the Nationalist Government in Southwest China during the late stage of the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争时期国民革命军的战区之一。
description.en: One of the war zones of the National Revolutionary Army during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南的出生地，位于今浙江省宁波市镇海区。
description.en: The birthplace of Hu Zongnan, located in present-day Zhenhai District, Ningbo, Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 英籍华裔作家，其著作《毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事》引发争议。
description.en: A British-Chinese writer whose book 'Mao: The Unknown Story' caused controversy.

nodes.id: 毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事

zh-cn: 毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事

description.zh-cn: 由张戎及其丈夫乔·哈利戴合著的毛泽东传记。
description.en: A biography of Mao Zedong co-authored by Jung Chang and her husband Jon Halliday.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家、军事家，曾任中华民国副总统及行政院院长。
description.en: A politician and military leader of the Republic of China, who served as Vice President and Premier of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，曾任陆军总司令、参谋总长。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army, served as Commander-in-Chief of the Army and Chief of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南是蒋介石的心腹之一，深受其器重与信任。
description.en: Hu Zongnan was one of Chiang Kai-shek's confidants and was highly valued and trusted by him.

relationships.target: 中华民国陆军军官学校

description.zh-cn: 因胡宗南身高不足，经时任军校党代表廖仲恺特许被录取。
description.en: Due to Hu Zongnan's insufficient height, he was admitted to the military academy with special permission from Liao Zhongkai, the party representative at the time.

description.zh-cn: 青年时代曾追随斧头帮领袖王亚樵。
description.en: In his youth, he followed Wang Yaqiao, the leader of the Axe Gang.

description.zh-cn: 参与组织力行社。
description.en: Participated in the organization of the Lixing Society.

description.zh-cn: 参与组织复兴社。
description.en: Participated in the organization of the Fuxing Society.

description.zh-cn: 被列为“十三太保”之首。
description.en: Was ranked as the head of the 'Thirteen Taibao'.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共间谍，将胡宗南的军事行动计划泄露给中共方面，导致国军多次作战失利。
description.en: As a CCP spy, he leaked Hu Zongnan's military operational plans to the CCP, leading to several operational failures for the Nationalist army.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南晚年曾感慨称周恩来是其“政治克星”。
description.en: In his later years, Hu Zongnan lamented that Zhou Enlai was his 'political nemesis'.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南晚年曾感慨称彭德怀是其“军事克星”。
description.en: In his later years, Hu Zongnan lamented that Peng Dehuai was his 'military nemesis'.

description.zh-cn: 以李梦彪为首的46名监察委员联名弹劾胡宗南，指其贻误军机。
description.en: 46 members of the Control Yuan, led by Li Mengbiao, jointly impeached Hu Zongnan for military failures.

description.zh-cn: 在胡宗南遭监察院弹劾后，蒋介石出面庇护，使其未被交付军法会审。
description.en: After Hu Zongnan was impeached by the Control Yuan, Chiang Kai-shek protected him, preventing him from facing a court-martial.

description.zh-cn: 介绍其学生叶霞翟与胡宗南相识，促成两人婚事。
description.en: Introduced his student Ye Xiazhai to Hu Zongnan, which led to their marriage.

description.zh-cn: 两人曾在西安相处多年，交往甚密。
description.en: The two spent many years together in Xi'an and had a very close relationship.

description.zh-cn: 在宜川战役中阵亡。
description.en: Killed in action during the Yichuan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在宜川战役中阵亡。
description.en: Killed in action during the Yichuan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战后期，胡宗南指挥的部队屡战失利，最终全军覆没。
description.en: In the later stages of the Second Chinese Civil War, the troops commanded by Hu Zongnan suffered repeated defeats and were eventually annihilated.

position.en: Deputy Chief and Chief of Staff

description.zh-cn: 在其著作《毛泽东：鲜为人知的故事》中，暗示胡宗南可能是“红色代理人”，此说法引发争议并遭到胡宗南后人抗议。
description.en: In her book 'Mao: The Unknown Story', she suggested that Hu Zongnan might be a 'red agent', a claim that sparked controversy and protests from Hu's descendants.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南赴郑州会晤时任参谋总长陈诚，检讨战局并研究作战方案。
description.en: Hu Zongnan went to Zhengzhou to meet with then Chief of the General Staff Chen Cheng to review the war situation and study operational plans.

description.zh-cn: 胡宗南赴郑州会晤时任郑州绥靖公署主任顾祝同，检讨战局并研究作战方案。
description.en: Hu Zongnan went to Zhengzhou to meet with Gu Zhutong, then Director of the Zhengzhou Pacification Headquarters, to review the war situation and study operational plans.
